```{r}
outliers <- function(x) {
  a <- quantile(x)[2] 
  b <- quantile(x)[4] 
  as.logical(x<a | x>b)
  
}
outliers(1:10)
```

```{r}
EnglishNumbers <-  c("zero","one", "two", "three", "four")
numToText <- function(num,lang) {
  ans <- lang[num+1]
  return(ans)
  }
numToText(2,EnglishNumbers)
```

``` {r}
EnglishNumbers <-  c("zero","one", "two", "three", "four")
TextToNum <- function(word,lang) {
  ans = which(lang == word)
  return(ans-1)
}
TextToNum("three", EnglishNumbers)
```

``` {r}
lettersMatch <- function(words,pattern) {
  a = grep(pattern,words)
return(a)
  }
lettersMatch(c("apple", "berry", "carrie", "rr"), "rr" )
```

``` {r}
piSeries <- function(n) {
  k <- 1:n
  sum <- 4*(1-(1/k[3]))
  sum <- sum + (1/k[5])
  sum <- sum - (1/k[7])
  sum <- sum + (1/k[9])
  sum <- sum - (1/k[11])
  sum <- sum
  return(sum)
  }
piSeries(7)
```
